content: ealasaid baby blanket designed by michelle stalker materials used james c brett baby dk 400g 5 mm hook finished size 36x36 inch abbreviations u s terms chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch repeat repeat st stitch this blanket it worked with no turns you are alternating stitches on each round ie a front post double crochet will have a double_crochet above it and a double_crochet will have a front post double_crochet above it ch2 counts as a double_crochet ch4 join to first chain to make a circle row 1 ch2 11 double_crochet in middle of circle slip_stitch to top of ch2 12 dcs row 2 ch2 2 double_crochet in same st as ch2 working over the next 2 post *1 fpdc 1dc 1fpdc 3 double_crochet in next st**repeat twice 1fpdc 1dc 1fpdc slip_stitch to top of ch2 24 sts row 3 slip_stitch to next double_crochet ch2 1dc ch1 2dc all in the same double_crochet *1fpdc 1dc 1fpdc 1dc 1fpdc 2dc ch1 2dc in next st**repeat twice 1 fpdc 1dc 1fpdc 1dc 1fpdc slip_stitch to top of ch2 36st 4 ch1 row 4 slip_stitch to ch1 space ch2 1dc ch1 2dc *skip next post 1 fpdc 1dc repeat these 2 sts till next ch1 space 2dc ch1 2dc** repeat twice 1 fpdc 1dc till end slip_stitch to top of ch2 48st 4 ch1 row 5-10 repeat row 4 at the end of row 10 you should have 120 st and 4 ch1 each row is an increase of 12 sts row 11 slip_stitch into corner ch1 ch1 does not count as a stitch 3 single_crochet in corner *1sc in the next 30 sts 3 single_crochet in corner**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 30 sts slip_stitch to first single_crochet 132 single_crochet row 12 slip_stitch into next single_crochet ch1 3sc *1sc in the next 32 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 32 single_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet 140 single_crochet row 13 slip_stitch into next single_crochet ch1 3 single_crochet *1sc in the next 34 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 34 single_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet 148 single_crochet row 14 slip_stitch into next single_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet *1dc in tge next 36 single_crochet 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 double_crochet in last 36 single_crochet slip_stitch to top of ch2 156 double_crochet row 15 slip_stitch into next double_crochet ch2 1dc ch1 2dc *1fpdc 1dc in the next 38sts 2dc ch1 2dc in next double_crochet**repeat twice 1fpdc 1dc in last 38 sts slip_stitch to top of ch2 168st 4 ch1 row16 slip_stitch to corner ch2 1dc ch1 2dc *miss next post *1fpdc 1dc till next corner 2dc ch1 2dc in corner** repeat twice 1 fpdc 1dc till end slip_stitch to top of ch2 180 st 4 ch1 row 17-23 repeat row 16 each row is an increase of 12 at the end of row 23 you should have 264 sts and 4 ch1 you will notice
